Open “Season : Magician”
- Changed battle mode
- Added Magician boss
- Added “NEW” dice [Gun Dice]
- Added Christmas theme
- Added Co-Op ranking
- Added battle record, report system
- Modified overall dice balance
- Removed AI
- Added game reconnection func.
- Modified difficulty after 40 Wave in Co-Op Mode
- Added premium emoticons
- Fixed some bugs

- For more information about balance, check the game for announcements.

2.4.0 Release Note
- Added new dice : Gift dice
- Fixed a bug that some skills were applied to bosses
- Fixed a bug that sometimes does not disable a daily store items
- Fixed a bug that sometimes Magician Boss stops
- Fixed a bug that Magician Boss would sometimes not use the Meteor Skill
- Fixed a bug that initializes the account data
- For more information about dice, please refer to the announcement in the game.

- New Dice : Clone Dice, Silence Dice, ix10 Dice, Healing Dice
- New Boss : IIIIIIIIIII
- As the Update 01 of 1st Anniversary event ending, 1st Anniversary Dice is substituted by Healing Dice.
- Few dice effects are undergoing some change.
- The endless rounds in PvE now have no pattern for Bosses to appear.
- From in-game battlefield, you can now check the Dot Count Indicator placed at top right corner of each dice upgrade UI, which shows the number of dots you have on the board.

- Clone Dice : VFX for Attack Counts till next cloning has been added.
- Healing Dice : SFX has been added.
- ix10 Dice : VFX and SFX has been changed.
- IIIIIIIIIII Boss : Skill Casting cooldown has been changed. (Initial Cast : 5sec, Re-Cast : 10sec)
- Outline color of the Dot Count Indicator has been changed. (Under 5 : White, Under 20: Yellow, Under 40 : Red, etc)
- Minor Bug Fixed.

[Dice]
1. Arrow : Skill damage 2 times -> 5 times
2. Death : Skill casting chance 2% -> 5%
3. Crack : Stack function added (Max 3) 2% -> 2% * 3 = 6%
4. Teleport : Unknown Space added (Teleport Dice can store monsters upto 5 times of dot count. Summon stored monsters on opponent's path when merged. However, summon stored monsters on own path when hit by any debuff skills.)
[Others]
1. UI improved in Notification and Update Note.
2. Improved the Tutorial.
3. Enhanced the Security System.
[Bug Fixed]
1. Fixed the problem of loading when entering to lobby.
2. Fixed the problem of sorting in Inventory.
3. Fixed the problem of "Get All" button.

[Season]
The Season has been updated.
Each season lasts for 5 weeks and the Season 1 ends on May 24th.

[Bug fix]
- Fixed a bug which the high rate of crit chance applies to the main target for certain splash attacks buffed by the Scope Dice.
- Fixed a bug which crit rate won't properly apply for Gun Dice buffed by Scope Dice.
Also, improved the Gun Dice so that now the Scope Dice's ability can be applied to Gun Dice's bonus targets.

[Bug Fix]

1. All class emblems appear as Champion 1 in Profile tab.
2. The emoticon 'Blue's Sorry' doesn't properly appear.
3. Duplicate ranking data shows up.

Also improved:
1. To earn more Trophies upon winning in a battle.

[Improvement]
- Clarified the visibility of Golden Trophy gauge in Profile tab.
- The Trophy fluctuation system has been improved as below:
(1) The fluctuation of the Trophies gets wider based on the Trophy difference between the two players.
(2) The fluctuation limit gets wider based on the Class difference between the two players.(However, the max fluctuation is limited to certain point that it won't give or take away excessive amount of the Trophies.
(3) The amount of Trophies earned by the winner is larger than the amount lost by the defeated.
[Bug Fix]
Fixed an issue which:
- The abnormal indication of the Trophies earned with the Burning(Ad) displays.
- The battlefield effect doesn't apply with certain dice.

(3) The amount of Trophies earned by the winner is larger than the amount lost by the defeated.
